Jelang Munas, Golkar Nyatakan Siap Jaga Stabilitas Politik
07 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Faidah Umu Sofuroh
Jakarta -
Dalam pidato HUT Partai Golkar ke-55 di Hotel Sultan, Presiden Jokowi menyampaikan pesan yang sangat kuat, jelas, dan terang-benderang bahwa Partai Golkar harus solid. Keguncangan sedikit saja di internal Partai Golkar akan berpengaruh terhadap politik nasional.
Ketua DPP Partai Golkar Bidang Media & Penggalangan Opini, Ace Hasan Syadzily mengatakan bahwa Golkar harus memahami pernyataan Presiden Jokowi bahwa seluruh komponen Partai Golkar harus menjaga soliditas agar tidak menimbulkan kegaduhan politik.
"Negara ini membutuhkan stabilitas politik dalam menghadap tantangan perekonomian global yang sedang menghadapi pelambatan ekonomi," katanya dalam keterangan tertulis, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Ketua Umum Partai Golkar Airlangga Hartarto, yang juga Menteri Perekonomian, lanjutnya, memiliki peran yang sangat penting dan strategis untuk menjaga stabilitas ekonomi dan sekaligus memastikan stabilitas politik internal Partai Golkar.
Presiden Jokowi sangat tahu apa yang terjadi dengan dinamika internal Partai Golkar menjelang Munas. Ia mengetahui siapa yang membuat komitmen.
"Karena itu, tegas sekali Presiden Jokowi agar 'menjaga komitmen'," ujarnya.
Pernyataan ini merupakan sikap yang tegas dari Presiden Jokowi. Siapa pun harus menjaga stabilitas politik Partai Golkar demi bangsa ini.
"Jangan selalu membuat kegaduhan menjelang Munas ini," ucapnya.
Menurutnya, figur Airlangga Hartarto jelas sangat dibutuhkan memimpin Partai Golkar demi bangsa untuk periode yang akan datang sekaligus memimpin Tim Ekonomi Kabinet Indonesia Maju dalam menghadap tantangan dan tekanan ekonomi global yang berpengaruh terhadap ekonomi dalam negeri.

text:
Ahead of the National Conference, Golkar Declares Ready to Maintain Political Stability
07 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Faidah Umu Sofuroh
Jakarta -
In his 55th birthday Golkar Party Anniversary at the Sultan Hotel, President Jokowi conveyed a very strong, clear, and clear message that the Golkar Party must be solid. The slightest internal shaking of the Golkar Party will affect national politics.
Golkar Party DPP Chairman for Media & Opinion Building, Ace Hasan Syadzily said that Golkar must understand President Jokowi's statement that all components of the Golkar Party must maintain solidity so as not to cause political upheaval.
"This country needs political stability in facing global economic challenges that are facing an economic slowdown," he said in a written statement, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Chairman of the Golkar Party Airlangga Hartarto, who is also Minister of the Economy, he continued, has a very important and strategic role in maintaining economic stability and at the same time ensuring the internal political stability of the Golkar Party.
President Jokowi knows very well what is happening with the internal dynamics of the Golkar Party ahead of the National Conference. He knows who made the commitment.
"Because of this, President Jokowi is very resolute to" keep commitments "," he said.
This statement is a firm attitude from President Jokowi. Anyone must maintain the political stability of the Golkar Party for the sake of this nation.
"Don't always make a scene before the National Conference," he said.
According to him, Airlangga Hartarto's figure is clearly very much needed to lead the Golkar Party for the nation for the coming period and at the same time lead the Advanced Cabinet Economic Team in facing global economic challenges and pressures that affect the domestic economy.
